timeline.bodyText: I wonder whether it'd be better to do this whole test in the YAML suite. I think that's possible. WDYT?

replies.bodyText:
I'm not sure I can do it in YAML: this test computes the total bytes written in cache (the stats API does not compute total among all shards and files) after a given query, then clear the cache and run the query again to verify that more data has been written in cache gain.
I pushed 587819a to run the same query before/after the cache clearance.
